data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Akkar, Lebanon to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Akkar, Lebanon
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 1,409 believers in the state of Akkar the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 1,409 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Akkar words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Kurd, Kurmanji people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Akkar, Lebanon to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Akkar, Lebanon.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Akkar prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

location.name: Akkar
